name: Idiot Sandbox
description:
Idiot Sandbox is an simple game in which the player picks between many different levels and creates a war between the three factions summoning enemies from each faction to fight against each other. 

Note: This was a little fun project i worked on a while ago when i was just learning how to do the basics in game development and these kinds of games were popular. despite there being a lot i could improve on this game I still have fondness over this game,  so with that being said, please enjoy the game if you wish to try it out. i mainly posted this as a test so i can figure out Itch.io. But if you do enjoy it then maybe you may enjoy any future projects i will be working on.

There wont be any more updates for this game.
